name: Peoples Bank, in Possession of Secretary of Banking, Appellant, v. McDowell National Bank
name_abbreviation: Peoples Bank v. McDowell National Bank

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer and Maxey, JJ.
parties: Peoples Bank, in Possession of Secretary of Banking, Appellant, v. McDowell National Bank.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed upon the opinion of the Superior Court.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Louis J. Wiesen, for appellee, was not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Peoples Bank, in Possession of Secretary of Banking, Appellant, v. McDowell National Bank.
Argued March 14, 1932.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer and Maxey, JJ.
Thomas H. Armstrong, for appellant.
Louis J. Wiesen, for appellee, was not heard.
May 14, 1932:
